com.baasbox.android.net

Interface RestClient


  • public interface RestClient
    This interface represent an http client for Baasbox. Created by eto on 23/12/13.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.http.HttpResponse execute(HttpRequest request)
      Execute the http request returning on success an HttpResponse from the service.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        org.apache.http.HttpResponse execute(HttpRequest request)
                                     throws BaasException
        Execute the http request returning on success an HttpResponse from the service. May fail, with any exception, but that must be wrapped in a BaasException.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        an http response
        Throws:
        BaasException
